Notes for testing \(mainly for @{557058:095b1e12-74ed-4e20-b44f-2f0745b616e0} \):

Test 1

1. Verify that publisher <--> subscriber work in regular conditions in the same machine \(just to make sure that your setup is right\).

Test 2

1. Setup two computers with this branch compiled and at least one of them connected via WiFi.
2. Run a traffic shaper without packet loss in one of the machines introducing a delay of 200 ms. \(something bigger than 170 ms should be good for testing\).
3. Run publisher and subscriber \(make sure to set IGN\_PARTITION with the same value in both machines. I remember having some issues with the traffic shaper and I had to set IGN\_IP in both machines too\). The subscriber should receive data.

Test 3

1. Setup two computers with this branch compiled and at least one of them connected via WiFi.
2. Run publisher and subscriber \(make sure to set IGN\_PARTITION with the same value in both machines. I remember having some issues with the traffic shaper and I had to set IGN\_IP in both machines too\). The subscriber should receive data.
3. Run a traffic shaper without packet loss in one of the machines introducing a delay of 20000 ms. The subscriber should stop receiving data. This is expected.
4. Wait 5 seconds.
5. Stop the traffic shaper. The subscriber should recover and continue receiving data.

Tests 2 and 3 should fail using `ign-transport7` but should work on this branch.
